animals.name: Lion
animals.description: The lion is a large carnivorous mammal known as the 'king of the jungle.' It is known for its majestic appearance and powerful roar.

animals.name: Leopard
animals.description: The leopard is a stealthy and agile big cat with distinctive rosette patterns on its coat. It is known for its ability to climb trees.

animals.name: Rhino
animals.description: The rhinoceros, often called a rhino, is a large herbivorous mammal characterized by its thick protective skin and one or two horns on its nose.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: The elephant is the largest land animal and is known for its impressive size, trunk, and large ears. It is a social and intelligent creature.

animals.name: African Buffalo
animals.description: The African buffalo, also known as the Cape buffalo, is a large and robust bovine with distinctive horns. It is found in various habitats across Africa.
